key.name: paths-to-backup
key.summary: List of paths to be backed up by (ana)cronopete
key.description: (ana)Cronopete will backup all the files and folders contained in the list of folders contained in the list. The substring $HOME will be replaced by the user's home folder (thus, "$HOME/tmp" will be replaced by "/home/username/tmp").

key.name: paths-to-exclude
key.summary: List of paths to be excluded from being backed up by (ana)cronopete
key.description: (ana)Cronopete will not backup the files and folders contained in the list of folders contained in the list, unless they are also specifically set in paths-to-backup. The substring $HOME will be replaced by the user's home folder (thus, "$HOME/tmp" will be replaced by "/home/username/tmp").

key.name: exclude-hiden-in-home
key.summary: Whether to backup or not the hiden files/folders in the $HOME folder
key.description: If true, (ana)cronopete will not backup the hiden files and folders contained in the $HOME folder.

key.name: backup-enabled
key.summary: Whether (ana)cronopete backup is enabled or not
key.description: Set to true to enable the backing up of the hard disk; set to false to disable it.
